question: Does the text discuss household affordability factors (e.g., cost of living, rents, house prices, grocery prices, fuel prices)?

Yes.question: What is the nature of the cost of living/affordability pressures?

Increasing cost of living pressures.assessment: Leaning hawkish (Rising costs of living lead to inflationary pressures)

Easing cost of living pressures.assessment: Leaning dovish (Falling costs of living reduce inflationary pressures)
